Entry.JapaneseText: 本当にこの街、大丈夫なの？
Entry.EnglishText: Is this town really going to be all right?

Entry.JapaneseText: オレたちにできる事は ここまでだろうな……
Entry.EnglishText: I guess we've done all that we can here.

Entry.JapaneseText: 問題解決の糸口が見えたんだ。よそ者が 首をつっこめば、後々ロクな事にならない。
Entry.EnglishText: They've uncovered the first step to solving their problems. More meddling from outsiders won't help them.

Entry.JapaneseText: あとは本人たちの努力次第で、 庇らなりの答が見つかるだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: We need to leave it up to them to find their own solutions from now on.
